body:
Hey all of you, im playing avicus a lot and its time to introduce myself. My name is Noah im 16 years old and i play minecraft. I Life in the Netherlands. I joined about 1 year ago and played on the account called Flexuz_Hero ( https://avicus.net/Flexuz_Hero ) I used to play everyday till i lost the account. I got a other account called McBiggah3000 from a friend he was banned and i explained the situation and got unbanned. I changed my name to MatrixBeast and started playing again. The first day i played again i was on ts all day talking to the new members i havent met for a hole year. From the beginning i was a real killfarmer and loved the sound of getting a kill. I started calling people Ezz and made them mad <3. Im online everyday on the forums, ts and the server. I made a lot of friends from ts and the server and most of the people know me. I got 3 accounts: JustMatrix(Main)  https://avicus.net/justmatrix / FakeKid(Rush And Kills) https://avicus.net/fakekid / Probably102 ( Full time killfarmer ) https://avicus.net/probably102 . I rage ALOT and get mad in chat xD. I know im spamming or getting mad in chat  sometimes because people kill me on a weird way, and im sorry about that. I make video's sometimes: https://www.youtube.com/c/MatrixBeastt . I'm Currently in Xenarch but i love to scrim with other teams to. Here is some other information:

I love netflix

i love gym

i love killfarming

i love sleeping

i love good texturepack

i love YouTube

i love people who say Hi Matrix

i love Quintus

i love caps

i love mw3

SO TO LOKIGH AND CRAFTINGTHEORY FOR BEEING SNAPCHAT BUDDYS

SO TO AYYJAKE FOR ALWAYS KILLFARMING WITH ME

SO TO XENARCH FOR HAVING ME IN THE TEAM

SO TO NEMO FOR LOVING ME

Face Reveal :O:

Insta: https://www.instagram.com/_n.bt/

#SorryAboutMyRage

#WhySoEz

#BestEnglishEver

Cya <3

title: Who is Matrix? ( Face Reveal )

replies.body: We all know that you are FakeKid. But he is not in Cronus. Pretty sure. But I know that he applied both teams at the same time as he was saying 'I'm not Matrix' (on FakeKid account). We aren't idiots :)
replies.body_tagged: We all know that you are FakeKid. But he is not in Cronus. Pretty sure. But I know that he applied both teams at the same time as he was saying 'I'm not Matrix' (on FakeKid account). We aren't idiots :)
